main event: Multiple UFO sightings were reported over London, England, in May and June of 1955, including descriptions of a round disc and an unidentified object with bluish-white glow.
interesting points: One report details a round disc that is amber red in color, witnessed by a British civilian., Another sighting describes a circular object that hovered and then accelerated at high speed., A civilian witness noted that the object moved faster than both piston and jet aircraft., The same officer mentioned experiencing this sighting six times in the past nine years., Reports indicate meticulous observational conditions, with sketches provided to aid in documentation.
sighted object: unidentified flying objects, one described as a round disc and another as circular with a bluish-white glow
